author: Deepa H
text:
With less than three months for the Assembly elections, the ruling AIADMK has planned various outreach programmes to celebrate the 68{+t}{+h}birthday of its general secretary and Chief Minister Jayalalithaa such as conducting sports tournaments and distribution of welfare measures.

“Every year the party celebrates Amma’ s (Ms.Jayalalithaa’s) birthday. This time the cadre, who enthusiastically began work for the elections, are also ensuring that they celebrate her birthday in a grand manner,” said party spokesperson C.R.Saraswathi. She, however, added that the celebrations are being done in a manner to serve the people. “ Amma has always asked us to mark the day by distributing welfare measures to the people,” she said.

AIADMK cadres have also begun to pull temple cars and organising special pujas at all major temples.
title: Programmes planned for CM’s birthday
